chapters.title: The Aspiring Archer
chapters.description: Ekalavya, a young tribal boy, yearns to learn archery from Guru Dronacharya, inspired by his legendary skill.

chapters.title: The Unseen Guru
chapters.description: Denied formal training, Ekalavya creates a clay statue of Dronacharya and teaches himself, attaining unmatched skill.

chapters.title: Dronacharya's Test
chapters.description: Dronacharya encounters Ekalavya's skill and requests a guru-dakshina (teacher's fee) to test his dedication.

chapters.title: The Sacrifice
chapters.description: Ekalavya selflessly cuts off his thumb and offers it to Dronacharya, exemplifying devotion and respect.
